content:
alexcrichton commented on issue #6570:

Thanks! The wasm-tools subcommand should infer the name of the adapter from the name of the file, though, so in this example in the README I don't think it's necessary?

Iceber commented on issue #6570:

Thanks! The wasm-tools subcommand should infer the name of the adapter from the name of the file, though, so in this example in the README I don't think it's necessary?

I saw https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasm-tools/pull/1065, good idea
